mapper.sql: user_id, user_student_id, user_name, user_birthday, user_sex, user_phone, "user_ is_it_vip", user_vip_expiration_time, "user_ invited_user_id", "user_ integral", user_money, user_wechat_number, user_type
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_student_id, user_name, user_phone, user_password, user_is_it_vip,user_invited_user_id, user_integral, user_money, user_wechat_number, user_type, user_head_portrait_url) values ( #{user_student_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone},#{user_password}, #{user_is_it_vip}, #{user_invited_user_id}, #{user_integral}, #{user_money}, #{user_wechat_number}, #{user_type}, #{user_head_portrait_url})
mapper.update: update user set user_type = "1" where user_id=#{user_id};
mapper.select: select * from user where user_phone = #{user_phone} and user_password=#{user_password};

select
distinct
,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
